author: trawick
msg: simplify logic to update the caller's pollcb/pollset ptr,
fixing a apr_pollcb_create_ex() crash in one of the
fall-back paths which was reported by Neil Conway

author: trawick
msg: merge r834130 and r834133 from trunk:
fix incorrect assumptions in pollset/pollcb tests:
- polling won't necessary detect the status change immediately
- a single poll call won't necessarily return multiple status
